author: Cortex XSOAR

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Get information about a given alert in Tenable.sc.
commands.name: tenable-sc-get-alert

commands.description: Requires security manager role. List alerts from Tenable.sc.
commands.name: tenable-sc-list-alerts

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Get a list of Tenable.sc assets.
commands.name: tenable-sc-list-assets

commands.description: Lists the queries. Requires security manager role.
commands.name: tenable-sc-list-query

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Get a list of Tenable.sc existing scans.
commands.name: tenable-sc-list-scans

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Delete the asset with the given ID from Tenable.sc.
commands.name: tenable-sc-delete-asset

commands.description: Retrieve licensing information from Tenable.sc. Requires admin role.
commands.name: tenable-sc-get-system-licensing

commands.description: List plugin families / return information about a plugin family given ID. Requires security manager role.
commands.name: tenable-sc-list-plugin-family

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Create a scan on Tenable.sc
commands.name: tenable-sc-create-scan

commands.description: Update user details of the given user_id.
commands.name: tenable-sc-update-user

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Get a list of Tenable.sc scan repositories.
commands.name: tenable-sc-list-repositories

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Get details about a given vulnerability from a given Tenable.sc scan.
commands.name: tenable-sc-get-vulnerability

commands.description: List users in Tenable.sc. Results may vary based on the role type (admin or security manager).
commands.name: tenable-sc-list-users

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Get a single report with Tenable.sc scan results. In case of `Importstatus = Error` (The results import wasn't finished), the vulnerabilities section will not be added to the results.
commands.name: tenable-sc-get-scan-report

commands.description: Returns all scan results in Tenable.sc. Requires security manager role.
commands.name: tenable-sc-get-all-scan-results

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Get the status of a specific scan in Tenable.sc.
commands.name: tenable-sc-get-scan-status

commands.description: Creates a policy. Requires security manager role. This command is prerequisite for creating remediation scan.
commands.name: tenable-sc-create-policy

commands.description: Creates a remediation scan. Requires security manager role. This command is a prerequisite for creating remediation scan.
commands.name: tenable-sc-create-remediation-scan

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Get details for a given asset in Tenable.sc.
commands.name: tenable-sc-get-asset

commands.description: Get the system information and diagnostics from Tenable.sc. Requires admin role.
commands.name: tenable-sc-get-system-information

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Create an asset in Tenable.sc with provided IP addresses.
commands.name: tenable-sc-create-asset

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Update an asset.
commands.name: tenable-sc-update-asset

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Gets the specified device information.
commands.name: tenable-sc-get-device

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Get a list of Tenable.sc credentials.
commands.name: tenable-sc-list-credentials

commands.description: Requires admin role. Get a list of Tenable.sc scan zones.
commands.name: tenable-sc-list-zones

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Launch an existing scan from Tenable.sc. Set polling to true to follow the scan and receive results when scan is over.
commands.name: tenable-sc-launch-scan

commands.description: List all groups. Requires security manager role.
commands.name: tenable-sc-list-groups

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Get a list of Tenable.sc scan policies.
commands.name: tenable-sc-list-policies

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Get a list of Tenable.sc report definitions.
commands.name: tenable-sc-list-report-definitions

commands.description: Delete a user by given user_id. This command can be executed with both roles (admin or security manager).
commands.name: tenable-sc-delete-user

commands.description: Creates a new user. This command can be executed with both roles (admin or security manager) based on the role_id you choose.
commands.name: tenable-sc-create-user

commands.description: Requires security manager role. Delete a scan in Tenable.sc.
commands.name: tenable-sc-delete-scan

integration.description: With Tenable.sc (formerly SecurityCenter) you get a real-time, continuous assessment of your security posture so you can find and fix vulnerabilities faster.
integration.name: Tenable.sc

description: With Tenable.sc (formerly SecurityCenter) you get a real-time, continuous assessment of your security posture so you can find and fix vulnerabilities faster.
name: Tenable.sc
